[3] The hyperbolic decline in the ADP/O flux ratio with increasing ADP limitation (Fig. 4) is a direct consequence of the linear relation between oxygen flux and ADP flux, and results from the increasing proportion of nonphosphorylating respiration as the resting state is approached (Fig. 4 Inset).
